code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuoteList=_ref=>{let{user}=_ref;const[quotes,setQuotes]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchQuotes();},[]);const fetchQuotes=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/quotes/vendor');setQuotes(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching quotes:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quote-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"My Quotes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"quote-grid",children:quotes.map(quote=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quote-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:quote.rfpId.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"quote-category",children:quote.rfpId.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"quote-price",children:["Total: $",quote.totalPrice.toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"quote-delivery",children:["Delivery: ",quote.deliveryTime," days"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"quote-status",children:quote.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"quote-date",children:["Submitted: ",new Date(quote.submittedAt).toLocaleDateString()]})]},quote._id))})]});};export default QuoteList;
